hadiths.text: It was narrated that Tamim Ad-Dari said:“I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: ‘Whoever ties a horse in the cause of Allah, then feeds it with his own hand, he will have one merit for every grain.’”

chapter.ara-name: باب ارْتِبَاطِ الْخَيْلِ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: Keeping horses in the cause of Allah
